title: Tool - 10000 Days Hidden Track FLAC
description:
THIS IS THE ONLY KNOWN VERSION OF TOOL'S 10,000 DAYS (WINGS PT.2)'S HIDDEN TRACK IN FLAC AS OF 14/JANUARY/2014.


Info:


ALBUM: 10,000 Days
ARTIST: Tool
MUSIC: Daniel Carey, Adam Jones, Justin Chancellor
LYRICS: Maynard James Keenan
RELEASE DATE: April 28, 2006
ENCODER: Logic Pro X & Switch Pro
BITS: 16
SAMPLE RATE: 44,100Hz

The song was made by mixing (3) Wings for Mary (Pt. 1), (4) 10,000 Days (Wings Pt. 2) & (11) Viginti Tres. One track has 10,000 Days, while the other has Viginti Tres followed by Wings for Mary. 

The reason for this is that Viginiti Tres is 5:02 and Wings for Mary is 6:11, which add up to 11:14 (10,000 Days time as well). If the songs are perfectly arranged, a mix of harmony will surface from the music. Even though some parts seem to mismatch, it is all played with a constant rhythm.

Torrent by Abuela666
